title: OnePlus cranks up hype machine for OnePlus 10R, confirms charging up to 150W and ‘Ace’ in China
content:
OnePlus has some impressive marketing tactics, and this week the company is putting that muscle behind its next launch. Today, OnePlus has confirmed the “OnePlus 10R” and “OnePlus Ace” are coming, and with charging speeds up to 150W.

more…

The post OnePlus cranks up hype machine for OnePlus 10R, confirms charging up to 150W and ‘Ace’ in China appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus is cranking up its hype machine for the OnePlus 10R, confirming the phone's design, 150W charging, and "Ace" rebrand in China.
